name: Conquest

physical_specifications.posture: Wide stance, squared shoulders; head slightly tilted like sizing up prey.
physical_specifications.build: Ultra-muscular and broad-chested; massive shoulders, thick arms, and powerful legs. Physique conveys extreme physical dominance and decades of combat conditioning.

facial_structure.face_shape: Square with heavy brow ridge and strong chin.
facial_structure.skin_tone: Weathered tan (HEX #C9A57D) with deep lines, sun exposure, and rugged texture; no scars.

mustache.style: Thick, full, well-groomed silver mustache with slight curl at edges; non-optional.
mustache.texture: Thick individual hairs with realistic directionality and subtle natural variation in shade.

eyes.shape: Deep-set, intense gaze with slightly hooded upper lids.
eyes.iris: Steel blue (HEX #5B7C99) with faint radial striations.
eyes.brows: Thick, slightly unkempt, silver-grey with darker roots.

hair.style: Short, coarse, silver-gray (HEX #B2BEB5) with military cut.
hair.texture: Coarse with visible individual strands and realistic shading.

costume.accessories: Black waistband armor (HEX #1C1C1C) integrated into suit for mobility.
costume.boots: White reinforced combat boots with pale gray trim.
costume.gloves: Left glove integrated into suit; right arm replaced with large mechanical prosthetic in matte brass (HEX #B08D57) with glowing blue node.

lighting_behavior: Neutral three-point lighting; soft key, cool fill, faint rim; lock exposure/white balance.
